page.title: 10HEADMASTER OF WEST WIGHT
page.content: Mr Toms is headmaster of West Wight Middle School. He has been a headmaster for 4 years and has been teaching for 18 years. He would like to see better accoustic conditions, better heating and roofing, more C.D.T lessons and more involvement with the community. Mr Toms' previous jobs were as a builder's labourer, a waiter and an ice-cream seller. He would like to do things with history, things to do with youth and also something with plants, work in a book or art shop or be a professional tennis player. Mr Toms likes his job and he went to Carisbrooke Grammar School and to King Alfreds College, Winchester. There are 19 teachers in the school, 384 children and 46 other people.
